description:
Enjoy camping without feeling confined while you sleep. Designed to be more spacious than your standard mummy bag, the Yawn Patrol has room to move inside without sacrificing thermal efficiency. A versatile dual zipper design lets you customize your ventilation or turn the whole sleeping bag into a quilt for warmth around camp.

  • Lightweight 30D nylon ripstop top shell fabric and durable 45D ripstop bottom
  • Insulated with 650-fill-power duck down that meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Curved rectangular shaping accommodates side sleepers
  • Integrated pillow pocket and phone pocket for convenience
  • Dual zippers allow the bag to be worn as a parka near the campfire
  • Draft collar helps seal in the heat
  • Long zipper on one side of the bag wraps around the footbox, allowing for easy ventilation
  • 4 webbing loops for easily attach to any sleeping pad
name: Mountain Hardwear Yawn Patrol -9C Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
